sections.title: The Sign of the Fishes
sections.thesis: Astrological and historical symbolism of the aeon, focusing on the fish motif and its tensions.

sections.body: This chapter matters because it clarifies the lens you will use throughout Aion: symbolic tensions are not distractions, but the material of psychological transformation.

terms.definition: A long historical-astrological age whose symbols shape collective imagination and conflict.
A historically layered motif in Aion that carries paradoxical meanings of totality, salvation, and shadow.
The tension of contrary psychic tendencies whose containment can generate transformation.
